about_the_game:
Sekiro-like combat experience

Fast pace of offense and defense. Detect and take advantage of the attack intervals of monsters after blocking to counterattack and adjust your own state. Combine with your own combat styles to build a refreshing combat experience that belongs to you.

Weapon unsealing

You will obtain unsealing points when you successfully block the enemy's moves.


You can also obtain unsealing points when you successfully break the enemy's red moves.
What can unsealing points be used for? Of course, to unlock your own hidden seals! Weapons and appearances will enter the unsealed form! Greatly improve your own performance.
Sword Ui.gif
Unsealed attack.gif (The shader hasn't been completed yet and will be added later.)

Style building

Do you prefer the exciting offense and defense experience brought by more risks?
Or do you like to be steady, constantly dodge and defend, and take the opportunity to end the battle with one strike?
Or would you rather obtain a large number of top-notch equipment, deeply understand the game, and then continuously stack buffs in battles to directly confront monsters?
All of these can become a reality!
According to players' own preferences, build your own combat styles through equipment, items, skills, and the five elements.

Hilarious plot performance

Oh my god! Your beloved dog has been abducted by the Goddess of Light. You ask the goddess what she wants with your dog.
Perhaps your lovely dog is too mighty and majestic...
Anyway, whoever took your dog, you have to kill them! After all, you are John... a female knight with white hair!
Then you set off on the road to find your beloved dog with a succubus who has been pestering you all the time...!?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX (1GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600 (quad-core) / AMD® Ryzen™ 3 2200G (quad-core)
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (6 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX 580 (8 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A580 (8 GB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: 《The Forgotten Deity》is a refreshing action game with a 2D pixel art style, in which blocking is an important mechanism for the exciting offense and defense battles. You will take back your beloved dog from the hands of the Goddess of Light and get involved in the game of the gods.
